title: Jan 4: Fully Convolutional Neural Net to do segmentation

cells.data:
## Fully Convolutional Network

[Paper](https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jonlong/long_shelhamer_fcn.pdf) 
[code](https://github.com/shelhamer/fcn.berkeleyvision.org)
Pytorch implementation:
[code](https://github.com/wkentaro/pytorch-fcn)

Output dimensions reduced by subsampling, coarsens the output of a fully conv version, reducess input by a factor equal to the pixel stride of the receptive fields of the output units.

## Encoder-decoder Network
Uses VGG architecture, but implemented in Caffe.
[Paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1511.00561.pdf)
[Webpage](http://mi.eng.cam.ac.uk/projects/segnet/#code)
[code](https://github.com/alexgkendall/caffe-segnet)

## MIT's pytorch models on semantic segmentation
[code](https://github.com/CSAILVision/semantic-segmentation-pytorch)
